version_description:
+Bright colour for event location.
+Minor bug fixed.

+Bright colour for event location.
+Minor bug fixed.

New features:
+Support iOS 10.
+Update calendar store.

New features:
+Support iOS 10.
+Update calendar store.

New features:
+ Black widget background color option for iOS 10.

Bug fixed:
+ Blank event on today.
+ Icon shrinking animation.

Thank you for using WidgetCal! If you leave a review in the App Store, it encourages us to keep improving WidgetCal .

Thank you for using WidgetCal! If you leave a review in the App Store, it encourages us to keep improving WidgetCal .

New features:
+ Dark mode supported.
+ New small and medium-size widget.
+ Support theme colors.
+ Option for remove duplicated stickers.

Improvements:
+ Fixed minor issues.

If you are not a big fan of the iOS 14 style widget, you can still use the old-style widget. Check ‘How to video’ in the app.

By the way, App Store reviews are very helpful to us. If you like WidgetCal, please leave your thought on Reviews. Your positive review encourages us to keep improving WidgetCal. Thanks for using WidgetCal.
